original: LINDAHL, Gustaf Adolf, Auktoriserad revisor, Stockholm, f 28/5 88, gm Tekla Rosen-qvist. DHS 11. Korresp HAB J B Berggren Halmstad 04—09, kont.ch AB H Gullberg & Co 11—12, kont.ch o prok fma J G Swartz o Kvarn AB J G S 12—17, kont.ch FHK :s bröd-avd 17—18, försälj Höganäs-Billesholm AB 18—19, sekr Tull- o Traktatkténs anglosaxiska sekt 19—23. Rev Sv Spannmåls AB (Sv Spannmålsfrn upa) sed. 31, utredn f general-poststyr 32, rev Clearingnmdn sed. 34, granskn.man LA sed. 36, rev Stat Reservförr.-nmd o granskn.m Stat Krisrev sed. 37, rev Inst f Husdjursförädl sed. 39, i Oscars församl sed. 39, Valutakont sed. 41. Styr.ordi Bostadsfrn Muttern 16 upa sed. 22, Bostadsfrn Sparven nr l Nrkp upa sed. 39, styr.led Bost.-frn Parken upa sed. 39. Resor: Tyskl 14, 23, Engl 39. Av trycket: »Betydelsen av Trollhätte kanals utvidgn» (Ek tidskr 10), »De direkta skatterna i Engl» (Ek tidskr 21), »Av-skrivn v växl penningvärde» (Ek Tidskr 22), »Utdr ur o någr komment t d av kongressen i USA 22 antagna nya tullagen» på uppdr av Jernkont (Upps 22), »De progress inkomstskatt i Sv (34), »Huru kontrollerar jag min skattsedel» (36), upps i tidskr Revisorn, Sv Dagbl, Hbgs Dagbl, GHT.
translated: LINDAHL, Gustaf Adolf, Authorized Auditor, Stockholm, b. 28/5 1888, m. Tekla Rosenqvist. DHS 11. Correspondence with HAB J B Berggren Halmstad 04—09, accounting clerk at AB H Gullberg & Co 11—12, accounting clerk and proxy for J G Swartz and Kvarn AB J G S 12—17, accounting clerk for FHK:s bread department 17—18, salesperson for Höganäs-Billesholm AB 18—19, secretary for the Customs and Treaty Anglo-Saxon section 19—23. Auditor for Sv Spannmåls AB (Sv Spannmålsfrön upa) since 31, investigation for the General Postal Authority 32, auditor for the Clearing Board since 34, inspector for LA since 36, auditor for the State Reserve Board and inspector for the State Crisis Audit since 37, auditor for the Institute for Animal Breeding since 39, member of Oscar's parish since 39, Currency Control since 41. Board member of Bostadsfrön Muttern 16 upa since 22, Bostadsfrön Sparven nr l Nrkp upa since 39, board member for Bostadsfrön Parken upa since 39. Travels: Germany 14, 23, England 39. Publications: "The Importance of Expanding the Trollhätte Canal" (Ekonomisk Tidskrift 10), "Direct Taxes in England" (Ekonomisk Tidskrift 21), "Excerpt on and Some Comments about the Congress in the USA Adopting New Tariff Laws in 1922" on behalf of Jernkont (Uppsala 22), "Progressive Income Tax in Sweden" (34), "How Do I Verify My Tax Assessment" (36), published in the magazine Revisorn, Svenska Dagbladet, Helsingborgs Dagblad, Göteborgs Handels- och Sjöfartstidning.
